Description: The following statement contains a magic number: app.Run (context => {  	if (context.Request.Path.Value == "/") {  		context.Response.ContentType = "text/plain";  		return context.Response.WriteAsync ("Hello World!");  	}  	context.Response.StatusCode = 404;  	return Task.Delay (0);  });
The following statement contains a magic number: context.Response.StatusCode = 404;
